member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.DomainServices.EntityFramework.LinqToEntitiesDomainService`1.PersistChangeSet
member.summary: This method is called to finalize changes after all the operations in the specified changeset have been invoked. All changes are committed to the ObjectContext, and any resulting optimistic concurrency errors are processed.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.DomainServices.EntityFramework.LinqToEntitiesDomainService`1.ResolveConflicts(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry})
member.summary: This method is called to finalize changes after all the operations in the specified changeset have been invoked. All changes are committed to the ObjectContext. If the submit fails due to concurrency conflicts will be called. If returns true a single resubmit will be attempted.
member.param: The list of concurrency conflicts that occurred
member.returns: Returns true if the was persisted successfully, false otherwise.

member.summary: Retrieves the corresponding to the given CLR type (where the type is an entity or complex type).

member.returns: True or false.
